website_summaries.verdict: This all-in-one cheese board is ideal for a dinner party. Crafted with premium Moso Bamboo, this serving platter is the perfect item to serve cheese, dried meats, fruits, and crackers with ease.
pros: Comes with a slide-out drawer with a stainless steel cutlery set
Kitchen-safe, organic material is harder than most other woods and requires little maintenance
cons: Some have said the board is smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a gift for my bridal shower and it is no lie one of my favorite pieces. I have used it for hosting a few dinner parties and it has been a complete hit. I loved it so much I bought one to gift as a housewarming gift for a friend. The drawer is easy to pull out/access and the cutlery included is such a great touch. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for a nice cheese/charcuterie board.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Greco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Garden Tub Time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my husbands and my Garden Tub times. This is absolutely perfect to put cheeses and other appetizers with crackers around the outside!! The compartment with the cheese knives is such a cool part of this piece! We are very happy with this purchase and would buy again and recommend! Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanea

customer_reviews.title: Great for that 'Foodie' in your life!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is such a foodie-he's obsessed! He watches cooking shows, loves to cook, grill and just eat! So, for his birthday I thought what better gift? He loved it! We had a whole table of charcuterie and used this to put all our meat and cheeses on--it was so easy to clean afterward and is obviously very durable seeing as it's made out of bamboo. So, no complaints here! We'll be using this product a lot in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value! Works perfectly for parties - we do a lot of cheese and cracker boards! Love how the crackers fit in the groove so they don't fall all Over the place. Heavy but easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the opportunity to use this last weekend. It's so cool and amazing. I was able to place 3 different types of crackers, 2 small containers of dip, cheese squares and salami on the top area. Trust me, it's pretty spacious. The bamboo feel really sturdy and when it came to wash it, I used very little water and finished it off using bounty brand napkins. I reccomend this product if you love to host parties and/or if you just simply enjoy placing some cheese and crackers out to munch on.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to using this cheese board! My girlfriend loves it and thinks the drawer with the cheese utensils is really cool. The board is quite firm and appears resilient.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: We liked it so well, bought one for us for the RV and the boat and when we travel
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blanchat

customer_reviews.text: My step mom and dad will love it I think
customer_reviews.author: Patrick bell

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift, quality product. My wife loves to entertain and this fit the bill 😁 love it. Even arrived a day early.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use at a wine and cheese party.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at our wine and cheese party. It would make a great gift for your favorite cheese connoisseur.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones

customer_reviews.title: They loved it! great size and quality material
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a house warming party. They loved it! great size and quality material. The drawer slides out smoothly and the utensils it comes with are perfect! This is great to give as a gift, I should have bought one for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 daughter's that are just starting out in new apartments/homes. When I saw this Cheese server I knew immediately that it would be the perfect gift for them. Every time they use it. They will think of us. BTW, it was a huge hit. It is beautifully made, heavy, with storage for serving knives.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Heilweil

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend for Valentine’s Day! She loved it. Easy to clean and a perfect size. 11/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: My Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cheese board for my girlfriend last year. Unfortunately we've only been able to use it twice...and already there's a crack in the board. She's stored the cheese board in the original packaging whenever it was not in use. Pretty upset about this as it's not the cheapest of cheese board out there. If it wasn't for the crack in the board, and it stayed in good condition, I'd have given this 5 stars. She loved the gift and was excited to use it when given the opportunity. Now it just looks cheap and not something we want to present to guests when they're over.
customer_reviews.author: J.Camp

customer_reviews.title: A cut above..
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bamboo cheese board with accessory utensils. Quite heavy. Also included, but not mentioned in the advertisement, were some type of slatelike signs to identify the cheese or meat. There are also two pens with white ink to write upon the slate. The one I received is slightly different than that pictured. I purchased it for my granddaughter's wedding shower list. She and her fiancé entertain a lot so I'm sure it will get good use.
customer_reviews.author: English Myst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend. It's fantastic!! He absolutely loves it--it's the perfect size and the cutlery in the drawer was a great idea. It looks really well made and I hope he has it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jefloofenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! Looks very nice and was fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ross

customer_reviews.title: nice housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.text: this was a much liked gift by my colleague. i am thinking about ordering it again for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shopdrop

customer_reviews.title: A gift your friends will love.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift, so I didn't get to use it myself. However, the recipient was very pleased with the quality, style and beauty of the piece. As a gift, I think this product would make anyone happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they tell us how much they use it often. I get random cell phone pictures from them showing it off with different cheeses so I think they are really enjoying the board. It is nice quality and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Nick San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, high quality cheese board with clever storage for utensils. Bought several as Christmas gifts and my family loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Horan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful serving piece. Great way to serve a variety of cheeses and crackers- with wine, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Zebley

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift to give.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for her birthday and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Pull the trigger, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, my girlfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: scratches
customer_reviews.text: it has a couple scratches,looks like it wasnt handled poorly
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Includes pamphlet with directions on how to maintain it.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding present
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my friend for her wedding she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hostess Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a hostess gift for my friend. It was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t even put 1 star if I could. I used this ONE time Christmas Day, handwashed and let air dry over night and it is cracked down the middle and another crack around the edges. This is HORRIBLE. Do not buy. Seems to be a recurring review.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnae Giesau

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.  Needs improvement on the drawer operation.
customer_reviews.text: Great finish and overall quality of both the wooden board and the knives/utensils. My only complaint is about the accessibility of the drawer. It is so well designed, that the drawer is completely inconspicuous and took me some time to figure out where the seams were in order to open it. It is also quite tight and does not slide out easily. I hope this becomes looser and easier to operate over time, I will also try to use some mineral oil on the groove hoping that this will help lubricate the drawer operation. Other than that, its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Gaitan

customer_reviews.title: A Unique Gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are Awsome cheese boards! I have given them as Wedding, Anniversary gifts and they are so nice had to get one for myself. Each arrive as schedule and were packaged lovely. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to buy an Awsome gift that is unique and of good quality. I will definitely buy again for special gifts. I hope this review was helpful. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy 53

customer_reviews.title: I gave it as a gift to my mother who ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my mother who entertains all the time. She loves it. Elegant appearance and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cheese board. I love that the knives fit inside the board.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Congrats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding gift. I hope they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. We both liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. We both liked it very much. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: John Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! A great price with a unique design. It is so functional to have the cheese knives right there so accessible. The side area for crackers is ample. Very attractive and just the right size. I would definitely recommend this product and would buy it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cheese board! delivery was fast. The knife set drawer is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift and now it’s on our list.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother. We liked it so much it’s on our wish list for Christmas 2017. I’ll be extra good Santa! Please leave this under the tree for me!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: It seam pretty
customer_reviews.text: You got hat you see in the pictures, the product it's a good gift for new homers
customer_reviews.author: Raul Zapata

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift and was used that night.  its great  thanks
customer_reviews.text: put vegetables and cheeses and slices of meat on it. it looked great and was very much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: lynda galoob

customer_reviews.title: You will love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! Wish it were offered in bigger sizes, but everyone who has seen it loves it! I have actually given this board as a gift to three separate households! Great Christmas gift, Birthday, etc. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-in-law for Christmas. Gave them the gift on Christmas Day 2017. Visited today (1/20/2018) and saw the crack pictured. My mother-in-law loved the board and followed washing instructions. But after 3 uses and less than a month after Christmas there is a large crack in the bamboo board. The utensils in the compartment are great quality and the board was great too aside from the crack. Low review will be updated if seller addresses the issue and replaces the product. But until then, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: MFWalkerJr

customer_reviews.title: I wiped down with water and already it looks like it is 40 years old
customer_reviews.text: Dries out really fast. I wiped down with water and already it looks like it is 40 years old. Suggest oiling it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a wedding gift for my nephew they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Great cheese board! I really like the hidden drawer for the cheese knives. It cleans up easily too. Great looking and great for a cheese lover. I have used it a bunch to entertain. It's really nice quality. Can't go wrong buying it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, lovely, awesome, gift to give, receive and USE!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas (ha, really for us). Love it. I opened to check it out. Spacious, loving the drawer and tools. We will get a lot of use out of this item. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Love the drawer with the cheese tools great for entertaining
customer_reviews.author: Estella O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, bad workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: We did not used it yet and now the cutting board wood split on the anterior part, also the brand emblem is imprinted backwards. Very disapponted in product and now the return time has expired and I still was not going to pay for returning damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I can't comment on it other than it looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We're giving it as a hostess gift so I can't comment on it other than it looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Cheese Board--Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We've been eating cheese, fruit, veggies and crackers a lot lately. Bought this for my wife for her birthday. It is well made, and the drawer with utensils is amazing. She really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived cracked
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this cheese board and absolutely loved the design and quality. However, it arrived scratched (as if it were used) and cracked, both times that I ordered it. Eventually I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Dilge Kanoglu Ozkan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, medium size
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, medium size, beautiful look. The drawers for the knives is very convenient as well as the grooves around all four edges for crackers or bread. I plan to use for holiday parties and casual snacks at home.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I could have chosen--other than diamonds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Valentine's gift for my wife. We entertain a good bit and she always sets out cheese, crackers,etc. She was using an old (very old!) cheese board that was way too small and heavy. It was very awkward to use. So, when I saw this I I thought it would be just perfect for our needs. And my wife loves it because everything fits in a compact space with the proper knives for all the different cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: packaged very nicely, and it appears to be great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend's housewarming party. The product arrived on time, packaged very nicely, and it appears to be great quality! I didn't open up the board to see the quality of the knives, but it looks to be made very well, with good quality wood, and my friend loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana DeVance

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This board not only looks great, but is very functional and easy to clean. I have used it numerous times and always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Fecher

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this as a wedding gift and they absolutely LOVE it. They also noted that it was perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift and they absolutely LOVE it. They also noted that it was perfect for their camper because it is organized and everything stays in place! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came quickly and looks great! I love the drawer with the utensils that ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing it on USAToday. It came quickly and looks great! I love the drawer with the utensils that come with it. The bamboo looks great. It came with instructions on how to preserve the beauty of the bamboo which was also nice. It's a nice size too. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Defective drawer turns this into an overpriced cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my wife for Christmas however, due to her being very ill, she just opened it a few hours ago and the drawer is broken and won’t come out... of course it’s too late to return it so we are stuck with a very expensive cutting board
customer_reviews.author: Vineyard Bay Automotive

customer_reviews.title: This will be a great git
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this as it is for a gift, but knowing who I bought it for it wii be a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: beachnana

customer_reviews.title: Great "all in one" board for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is a a lovely cheese board, with the cutlery set attached, for convenience and storage. I especially like the surrounding cracker tray...perfect, all in one serving piece! This company has good merchandise and good company values. Customer service is a plus! Package arrived on time, (however) product was defective.... the company immediately replaced. Another good Amazon company, that made shopping convenient !
customer_reviews.author: gypsy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HOUSEWARMING GIFT
customer_reviews.text: My relatives absolutely LOVED this beautiful gift for their new home and will putting it to good use!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this cheese board for Christmas. Pulled it out to use for the first time 4 months later & there was a deep crack through the center of the board. Very dissatisfied!! No warning or care instructions. Mineral oil should be used fur a week & do not put water on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great cheeseboard! Gave to my wife as a gift and she loved it. We use it for entertaining all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Agent Man

customer_reviews.title: ... made - lots of room and aesthetically pleasing - love the tray and serving pieces
customer_reviews.text: Well made - lots of room and aesthetically pleasing - love the tray and serving pieces. Packaged well and shipped super fast. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: shorty

customer_reviews.title: I also think it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. She’s all about finger food. I also think it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Deb In Ottawa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But pay attention to the cleaning and storage of the cheese board
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination of form and function
customer_reviews.text: Perfect combination of form and function. Very well made. Even the packaging and inside literature was quite impressive. We purchased one for a Christmas gift and one for our home.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Zenobia

customer_reviews.title: I like it because it’s so useful and practical
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it’s so useful and practical. You will love it when you use it. The only thing is when i opened it, the writing part that you can use for writing what kind of cheese or anything that you like to write was broken& I didn’t have time to return!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cheese board. My husband got it for me as a birthday gift and I love it. I keep it on my kitchen island even when I'm not using it. The drawer is convenient and the tools cut up my cheeses with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I got this for my son for Christmas. He loved it! I want one myself! It was so nice I got one for my other son and his wife, and they loved it also.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Cheese Board is PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: We entertain all the time and this bamboo cheese board is PERFECT! It's well made and durable. Awesome product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Great customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The cutting board cracked almost instantly with just wiping it off with a damp wash cloth. I contacted customer support and they replaced it within a few days. Great customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Forschmiedt

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Every Party!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great service piece for entertaining. It is beautiful as well as functional. I love that the crackers fit into the side slots and there is no need for a separate serving platter. Beautifully made and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: charlund

customer_reviews.title: Hope they like it!
customer_reviews.text: As a wedding gift, it looked nice. It should go well during the Honeymoon phase. Plus it's heavy enough to stop a knife or a smaller caliber bullet if the shit turns bad after the Honeymoon phase is over and it can be used as a shield.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: It was packaged well and the cutting board was beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift and the couple lived it. It was packaged well and the cutting board was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: kinderteacher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy & good quality. Love the look, and the fact that crackers fit nicely around the edges. Haven't used the included tools so I can't comment on those.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nauman

customer_reviews.title: The cheese board and cutlery are much, much nicer ...
customer_reviews.text: The cheese board and cutlery are much, much nicer than I expected for the price. I considered buying another because my parties are usuall quite large and I could use more surface. I can't wait to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cheese board. Received on time. Christmas gift to an excellent cook was highly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone who likes to entertain
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my dad for Christmas. He loves to entertain people and would always present a cheese board on a regular cutting board. This was a definite upgrade and adds to the presentation as well as having proper cheese knives. He was looking forward to his next party and present a proper cheese or charcuterie board! High quality! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 5cents

customer_reviews.title: It's a good weight, which indicates quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made board. It's a good weight, which indicates quality, and there were no imperfections straight out of the box. It even comes with cheese knives and serving wedges, which I was not expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Tiddywagon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding shower gift for my husband's nephew! This is very nice! It has some weight to it but not too heavy. I love the slide out drawer with the different knives!! I may have to get one for myself!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: B in N.O.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say it, but this product is pure garbage. First of all, it does LOOK great. After hand washing it once, it developed two huge, long cracks across the cheese board. The seller was kind enough to replace it. However, the replacement then developed a crack before we even used it. Avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Alan J Tepper

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. Love the drawer that holds the utensils
customer_reviews.text: I used this for New Year's Eve. It worked great. Love the drawer that holds the utensils. I would definitely recommend this for entertaining purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Golfergurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheese board, good tools.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece. Tools are all good quality... not fantastic but good for the price point. The drawer is heavier than the board so unless there is a lot of weight on the board the drawer is a bit difficult to open. The board actually sides away from the drawer easier than the drawer pulls away from the board. But it doesn't cause any problems.
customer_reviews.author: NonovUrbizniz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for housewarming party / and broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if it didn’t break after one use....Perfect for my housewarming party! The only thing is that I put it into the dishwasher and now the tray for the cutlet is hard to put back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and he thought it was "very cool. " He is very particular
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my husband, and he thought it was "very cool." He is very particular! Very well made and a very nice design with a clever utensil pull out drawer, and the tray around the top to put crackers! Looking forward to using it on New Year's Eve!
customer_reviews.author: katzmeow

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend this cheese board!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this cutting board, I didn't think we would use it very much, but in fact it's used a lot, the utensils are great,and the wood quality is outstanding, if I was going to change anything, making the cracker trough a little wider would help for some of the larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My item came chipped and needed it as a gift the next day..
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Klein

customer_reviews.title: Love the size & quality as well as the convenience ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the size & quality as well as the convenience of the pull out drawer. Liked mine so much, I bought another one as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product!
customer_reviews.text: We used this tray the day it arrived. It is sturdy and nicely made. It worked perfectly to serve multiple cheeses, spreads, fruits, veggies, and crackers.. it comes with care instructions and is packaged well. We kept the box it comes in for storage. I highly recommend this item. I will but more products from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fancy and well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband really loved his gift. It is fancy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoleta

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: My parents loved it for their new home! Great serving tray and just what they needed for hosting parties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for cheese and cracker lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen many cheese and crackers trays, but this one is great since it has a designated area for the crackers! The quality is great, it’s convenient that the cheese tools have its own storage drawer, and it’s a reasonable price! I bought 4, and will by more in the future for more future gifts!
customer_reviews.author: L.M.M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift and was able to enjoy it not long after they opened it. The product is made soundly and all the knives are well constructed and cut a variety of cheeses perfectly. It's nice that the drawer comes out completely to wash so that crumbs don't get stuck in there. I didn't notice a problem with the drawer sticking or not sticking. It travels well (items don't pop out) but also didn't have any issue with opening it either. Definitely would consider buying as a gift again! It makes quite a presence on the table.
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Cracked immediately after first use and it is too late to ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MARPAC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, my niece loves it, loves everything is together ❤
customer_reviews.author: Traci Pomarico

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: We got this cheese cutting board for our wedding then I gave it to my sister in law for her bridal shower. We both love it. It’s great for entertaining, which we do a lot of. Be sure to clean it right after use because it’s difficult to clean after. The wood is porous so the food can get stuck in there making it difficult to clean if not done right away. Over all love it!
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a hostess gift for a family member. She was very excited!
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be very sturdy with good workmanship. Love the storage compartment for the included utensils. Beautiful presentation for snack crackers, cheeses, etc. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CVZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely cheeseboard but unfortunately I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely cheeseboard but unfortunately I had to return it as after about a week it developed a large crack right down the middle. I was given a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these as hosting gifts and it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: Bambusi Cheese Board and Knife Set - 100% Organic Bamboo Wood Charcuterie Platter Serving Tray with Cutlery - Perfect for Birthday, Housewarming & Wedding Gifts
feature_bullets: THE EXCLUSIVE CHOICE FOR SERVING CHEESE: The key to enjoy slices of Italian Ricotta, English Cheddar, or French Vacherin with a glass of wine for holiday entertaining is to have our modern bamboo cheese board. Bordered by grooves that hold crackers, nuts, or olives and designed with a hidden drawer with four utensils, cheese knife. Bamboo-crafted tray makes a perfect serving board for entertaining guests.

SPLENDID WITH PREMIUM CRAFTSMANSHIP: Bambüsi cheese tray is handmade with 100% quality bamboo material and superior quality. The nonporous surface of this natural cheese board makes the BEST choice for cheese lovers as it doesn’t stain or absorb odors. It’s a super speedy dinner tray for weeknights and spacious to add salty and sweet foods. Do not place in dishwasher

COMPLETE CUTLERY SET FOR GOOD SLICING: The handy cutting knives that come with this bamboo cheese board cut through hard cheeses with minimal effort. They are made of high-quality stainless steel with bamboo handles that are easy to grip
AN AWESOME GIFT IDEA: Bambusi cheese tray makes a great wedding gift, we’ve even seen it given as house warming presents, anniversary gifts, Christmas gift, thanksgiving plates, and birthday gifts

FEEL SATISFIED OR MONEY BACK: At Bambusi, your satisfaction is what drive us to provide the highest quality products on the market. Our bamboo cheese boards are tailor-made with cheese lovers in mind that exceed current standards that go beyond expectations, if for any reason our product doesn’t live up your expectations, contact us for a replacement or a full refund
